main event: Two men observed a pulsating bright light in the sky during darkness, which then faded out.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10-15 minutes, The object appeared to pulsate and was described as a bright light, The observation was made at 3:00 AM, No additional information could be found in the files, The likely explanations were light, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena.
witness description: Two men who observed the object during the night
